globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You see the convoy arriving as Imperial troops begin to shuttle a group of Mon Calamari prisoners forward.

{-} Deploy the heroes except Loku Kanoloa to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText: {-} MOVE, PRISONER: Push the closest prisoner that is not on the Cell 4 spaces towards the cell.
{-} MOVE, REBEL SCUM: Push the closest prisoner that is not on the Cell 6 spaces towards the cell.

From your position, you look up at the treetop outpost Loku has fashioned for himself. He looks calm and determined. He motions for you to move into position as he raises his blaster rifle, taking aim.

{-} This is Loku's Outpost. Deploy Loku Kanoloa to the red highlighted space.
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent ladders. A small figure on a ladder can spend 2 movement points to place his figure  n a space containing a ladder of the same color.
{-} A figure on the outpost ignores walls and figures when determining line of sight or counting spaces. When tracing line of sight or counting spaces to a space in the outpost, ignore walls and figures.
{-} When an attack targeting a figure on the outpost is declared by a figure not on the outpost, add 1 white die to the defense pool.
Shortly after your arrival, the first prisoner is ushered forth by the Imperial soldiers.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent prisoners. Prisoners are neutral figures. A healthy Rebel figure can interact with a prisoner ({J} or {K}) to push that prisoner 3 spaces.
While you are still planning the best approach, a gate in the Imperial prison opens, and combat droids march out, scanning the treetops for hidden snipers.

entityProperties.name: Cell
entityProperties.theText:
The Imperial prison complex is like a fortress. Once a prisoner is inside, there is little chance of seeing them again.

{-} When a prisoner enters the cell, click "Prisoner transferred".

eventActions.theText:
The doors to the Imperial prison complex are already standing wide open, awaiting the prisoners.

{-} Imperial Officers and Stormtroopers will usher the prisoners towards the cell.
{-} When a prisoner enters the cell, click the green highlight and select "Prisoner transferred".
{-} The Rebels win at the end of Round 6.
{-} The Rebels lose when all 4 prisoners have been transferred.
Prevent the Empire from transferring the prisoners (prisoners transferred: &Prisoners claimed&/4).

{-} Rebel mission tokens represent ladders. A small figure on a ladder can spend 2 movement points to place his figure  n a space containing a ladder of the same color.
{-} A figure on the outpost ignores walls and figures when determining line of sight or counting spaces. When tracing line of sight or counting spaces to a space in the outpost, ignore walls and figures.
{-} When an attack targeting a figure on the outpost is declared by a figure not on the outpost, add 1 white die to the defense pool.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent prisoners. Prisoners are neutral figures. A healthy Rebel figure can interact with a prisoner ({J} or {K}) to push that prisoner 3 spaces. Imperial Officers and Stormtroopers will usher the prisoners towards the cell.
{-} When a prisoner enters the cell, click the green highlight and select "Prisoner transferred".
{-} The Rebels win at the end of Round 6.
{-} The Rebels lose when all 4 prisoners have been transferred.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
The remaining Imperials break ranks in a retreat, and Loku moves toward his friends. They meet each other in a warm embrace as he removes their binders.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Loku Kanoloa receives the “Battle Vision” Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
The door slams on the Imperial prison, and no matter what you do, it is impenetrable, with Lokus friends trapped inside. Despite the hopelessness of the situation, it takes three days to convince Loku to leave his post.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Prisoner transferred
globalEvents.eventText: Another poor soul vanishes into the Imperial prison.

globalEvents.name: Prison Guards
globalEvents.eventText: From the prison complex, more guards rush out to meet the Rebels.

globalEvents.name: Reinforced
globalEvents.eventText: The Imperial forces gather more troops to crush the Rebel ambush.

globalEvents.name: No more prisoners
globalEvents.eventText: The prison convoy looks to be complete now. No more prisoners will be moved today.

eventActions.theText: A new prisoner is brought forth.

The barrage of attacks brings you to your knees. You try to shake it off, but your pain appears to give the Imperial forces new vigor.

How many activation tokens do you have?
